TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AssemblyLoadContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示运行时绑定范围的概念。

span.span: Represents the runtime's concept of a scope for binding.

summary.span: 此类为抽象类。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示加载上下文。The represents a load context. 从概念上讲, 加载上下文创建用于加载、解析和可能卸载一组程序集的作用域。Conceptually, a load context creates a scope for loading, resolving, and potentially unloading a set of assemblies. 是一个抽象类。 is an abstract class. 需要实现才能创建具体的类。The needs to be implemented to create a concrete class. 存在主要用于提供程序集绑定隔离。The exists primarily to provide assembly binding isolation. 它允许在单个进程中加载同一程序集的多个版本。It allows multiple versions of the same assembly to be loaded within a single process. 它将替换 .NET Framework 中的多个实例提供的隔离机制。It replaces the isolation mechanisms provided by multiple instances in the .NET Framework. > [!NOTE] > 不提供任何安全功能。 does not provide any security features. 所有代码都具有该进程的完全权限。All code has full permissions of the process. ### 运行时中的用法Usage in the runtime 运行时实现了两个程序集加载上下文:The runtime implements two assembly load contexts: * 表示运行时用于应用程序主程序集及其静态依赖项的默认绑定上下文。 represents the runtime's default binding context which is used for the application main assembly and its static dependencies. * 方法通过实例化最基本的程序集来隔离它加载的程序集。 The method isolates the assemblies it loads by instantiating the most basic . 它有一个简化的隔离方案, 该方案单独加载每个程序集, 但没有依赖项解析。It has a simplistic isolation scheme which loads each assembly in its own with no dependency resolution. ### 应用程序使用情况Application usage 应用程序可以创建自己的, 以便为高级绑定方案创建自定义解决方案。An application can create its own to create a custom solution for advanced binding scenarios. 自定义重点介绍如何定义依赖项解析机制。The customization focuses on defining dependency resolution mechanisms. 提供了两个扩展点来实现托管程序集解析:The provides two extension points to implement managed assembly resolution: 1. 为解析程序集、加载和返回程序集提供了第一种机会。The provides the first chance for the to resolve the assembly, load it and return it. 如果返回`null`, 加载程序将尝试将程序集加载到中。If the returns `null`, the loader will try to load the assembly into the . 2. 如果无法解析程序集, 则原始的另一种机会是解析程序集。 If the is unable to resolve the assembly, the original gets a second chance to resolve the assembly. 运行时引发事件。The runtime raises the event. 此外, 虚拟方法允许自定义默认的非托管程序集解析。Additionally the virtual method allows customization of the default unmanaged assembly resolution. 默认实现返回`null`, 这会使运行时搜索使用其默认搜索策略, 这在大多数情况下都足够了。The default implementation returns `null`, which causes the runtime search to use its default search policy which is sufficient for most scenarios. ### 技术挑战Technical challenges * 不能在一个进程中加载多个版本的运行时。It is not possible to load multiple versions of the runtime in a single process. > [!CAUTION] > 加载多个副本或不同版本的 framework 程序集可能会导致意外的和难以诊断的行为。Loading multiple copies or different versions of framework assemblies can lead to unexpected and hard to diagnose behavior. > [!TIP] > 通过远程处理和/或进程间通信使用处理边界来解决此隔离问题。Use process boundaries with remoting and/or interprocess communication to solve this isolation problem. * 程序集加载的时间可能会使测试和调试变得困难。The timing of assembly loading can make testing and debugging difficult. 通常会加载程序集, 而不会立即解析其依赖项。Assemblies are typically loaded without their dependencies immediately being resolved. 依赖项在需要时加载:The dependencies are loaded as they are needed: * 当代码分支到依赖程序集时。When code branches into a dependent assembly. * 当代码加载资源时。When code loads resources. * 当代码显式加载程序集时。When code explicitly loads assemblies. * 的实现可能会添加新的依赖项, 这可能需要进行隔离才能存在不同的版本。The implementation of can add new dependencies which may need to be isolated to allow different versions to exist. 最自然的实现会将这些依赖项置于默认上下文中。The most natural implementation would place these dependencies in the default context. 仔细设计可以隔离新的依赖项。Careful design can isolate the new dependencies. * 绑定隔离过程创建多个类型相同的类型。The binding isolation process creates multiple types with the same type name. * 这可能会导致混淆错误消息, 例如 "type Foo. Foo 无法转换为 Foo 类型。"This can lead to confusing error messages, for example "type Foo.Foo cannot be cast to type Foo.Foo." * 跨隔离边界进行的封送处理是非常重要的。Marshaling across isolation boundaries is non-trivial. 典型的解决方案是使用在程序集中定义的接口, 该接口仅加载到默认加载上下文中。A typical solution would be to use an interface defined in an assembly which is only loaded into the default load context.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，允许根据其 解析和加载程序集。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows an assembly to be resolved and loaded based on its .
The loaded assembly, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在程序集解析过程中, 方法将首次将程序集名称解析为已加载的程序集。During assembly resolution, the method has the first chance to resolve the assembly name to a loaded assembly. 它可以加载程序集, 也可以`null`返回。It can either load an assembly or return `null`. 如果它返回`null`, 解决过程将继续。If it returns `null`, the resolution process continues. 有关完整的过程说明, 请参阅。See for the full process description. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要阻止递归堆栈溢出, 请不要从此方法中调用此实例的方法。To prevent recursive stack overflow, do not call this instance's method from this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Reflection.Assembly LoadFromAssemblyName(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName assemblyName) cil managed

param.name: assemblyName
param.span: 描述要加载的程序集的对象。

span.span: The object that describes the assembly to load.

summary.span: 根据 解析并加载程序集。

span.span: Resolves and loads an assembly given its .

returns.span: 已加载程序集或引发事件。

span.span: The loaded assembly, or throws.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过解析来加载程序集。 loads an assembly by resolving the . 这会触发完全解决。This triggers a full resolution. 解析回退顺序遵循以下过程:The resolution fallback sequence follows this process: 1. 方法调用。The method calls . > [!IMPORTANT] > 不得调用此方法以防止递归堆栈溢出。 must not call this method to prevent recursive stack overflow. 2. 除非加载了程序集或引发了异常, 否则该方法将尝试加载默认中的程序集。Unless the assembly is loaded or an exception is thrown, the method attempts to load the assembly in the default . 3. 除非加载了程序集或引发了异常, 否则方法将触发事件。Unless the assembly is loaded or an exception is thrown, the method fires the event. 4. 除非加载了程序集或引发了异常, 否则方法将触发事件。Unless the assembly is loaded or an exception is thrown, the method fires the event. > [!NOTE] > 如果`assemblyRef`指定完整的程序集名称, 并且与该简单名称匹配的第一个程序集具有不兼容的版本或区域性, 则会引发。 is thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies the full assembly name, and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a incompatible version or culture. 加载程序不会继续探测与简单名称匹配的其他程序集。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. 每个只能加载:Each can load only: * 可执行程序集的一个版本。One version of an executable assembly. * 每个区域性的附属程序集的一个版本。One version of a satellite assembly for each culture.

is not found.

span.span: Loads the contents of the native image of a managed assembly file on the specified path.
The loaded assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管程序集的本机映像是预实时编译的, 以优化在特定平台上运行的。The native image of a managed assembly is pre-jitted to optimize running on a specific platform. 程序集路径引用程序集的 IL 版本的路径。The assembly path refers to the path to the IL version of the assembly. 这是一个可选参数, 因为 IL 通常包含在本机映像中。It is an optional argument as the IL is typically included in the native image. 如果找不到本机映像, 则运行时可以将其用作回退。It can be used by the runtime as a fallback if the native image is not found.

span.span: The argument is not an absolute path.
The argument is not an absolute path.
The parameter is .

is not a valid assembly.

span.span: Allows derived class to load an unmanaged library by name.
A handle to the loaded library, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现始终返回 。The default implementation always returns . 当返回时, 运行时将加载该库及其默认策略。When is returned, the runtime loads the library with its default policy. 可以重写此虚方法以自定义非托管库搜索算法。This virtual method can be overridden to customize the unmanaged library search algorithm. 重写时, 该名称可用于标识库。When overridden the name can be used to identify the library. 加载的库不需要匹配请求的名称, 但可以根据需要进行转换。The loaded library does not need to match the requested name, but can be transformed as needed. 这可能包括调整平台特定命名的名称。This could include adjusting the name for platform specific naming.

summary.span: 在尝试加载到此程序集加载上下文时，程序集解析失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails when attempting to load into this assembly load context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的处理程序负责返回指定的程序集; 如果程序集未被识别, 则为`null`返回。It is the responsibility of the handler for this event to return the assembly that is specified, or to return `null` if the assembly is not recognized. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果为此事件注册了多个事件处理程序, 则将按顺序调用事件处理程序, 直到事件处理程序返回一个不`null`为的值。If more than one event handler is registered for this event, the event handlers are called in order until an event handler returns a value that isn't `null`. 后续事件处理程序将被忽略。Subsequent event handlers are ignored. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 值得注意的是, 可以在任何情况下为此事件添加处理程序, 包括默认上下文。It is noteworthy that a handler can be added for this event on any , including the default context.

MemberSignature.Value: .event class System.Func`3<class System.Reflection.Assembly, string, native int> ResolvingUnmanagedDll
Public Custom Event ResolvingUnmanagedDll As Func(Of Assembly, String, IntPtr)
public: event Func<System::Reflection::Assembly ^, System::String ^, IntPtr> ^ ResolvingUnmanagedDll;

summary.span: 在解析本机库失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a native library fails.

remarks.format: 如果无法通过默认解析逻辑 (包括) 解析本机库, 则会引发此事件。This event is raised if the native library cannot be resolved by the default resolution logic (including ).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetProfileOptimizationRoot(string directoryPath) cil managed

param.name: directoryPath
param.span: 存储优化配置文件的目录的完整路径。

span.span: The full path to the directory where the optimization profiles are stored.

summary.span: 设置用于存储此加载上下文的优化配置文件的根路径。

span.span: Sets the root path where the optimization profiles for this load context are stored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件优化通过对可能执行的方法进行后台编译, 从而提高了多核计算机上加载上下文的启动性能。The profile optimization improves the startup performance of the load context on multicore computers by performing background compilation of methods that are likely to be executed, based on profiles created during previous compilations. 有关更多信息，请参见。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StartProfileOptimization(string profile) cil managed

param.name: profile
param.span: 优化配置文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the optimization profile.

summary.span: 启动指定配置文件的配置文件优化。

span.span: Starts the profile optimization for the specified profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件优化通过对可能执行的方法进行后台编译, 从而提高了多核计算机上加载上下文的启动性能。The profile optimization improves the startup performance of the load context on multicore computers by performing background compilation of methods that are likely to be executed, based on profiles created during previous compilations. 有关更多信息，请参见。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Unload() cil managed

summary.span: 开始卸载此 。

span.span: Initiates an unload of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks + AssemblyLoadContext 只能在可回收后卸载。An AssemblyLoadContext can only be unloaded if it is collectible. + 卸载将以异步方式进行。Unloading will occur asynchronously. + 当存在对 AssemblyLoadContext 的引用时, 将不会进行卸载。Unloading will not occur while there are references to the AssemblyLoadContext.

span.span: Unloading is not allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Unloading As Action(Of AssemblyLoadContext)

summary.span: 卸载 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the is unloaded.
